an5.110:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.110:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an5.110:1.5: araddhaviriyo viharati thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5.110:1.6: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.110:1.7: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an5.110:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitun”ti.
